content: [Phase-1] Create database schema migration for shop tables (shop_products, shop_product_variants, shop_orders, shop_order_items, shop_settings) with RLS policies
[Phase-1] Build SpreadConnect API client (lib/spreadconnect.ts) with authentication, product/order methods, error handling, and TypeScript types
[Phase-2] Create admin product sync API endpoint (/api/admin/shop/sync) and settings management (/api/admin/shop/settings)
[Phase-2] Build shop product APIs (list products, product detail, stock check) with real-time pricing and caching
[Phase-3] Create shop frontend pages (layout, product listing, product detail) with middleware protection and shopping cart context
[Phase-4] Implement checkout flow with Stripe integration, webhook handler for shop orders, and SpreadConnect order submission
